title: S17 Ep63: The Gift of Past Lives & Reincarnation w/ David Bettenhausen & Carla Bogni-Kidd
itunes:title: The Gift of Past Lives & Reincarnation w/ David Bettenhausen & Carla Bogni-Kidd
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Gift of Past Lives and Reincarnation with Authors/Researchers, David Bettenhausen and Carla Bogni-Kidd!

Dave and Carla have been close friends since 1998. But only after increased stress levels in David's medical office led to Carla's suggestion that everyone in the office meditate to break the tension, did the real story begin!

Dave and Carla discovered through this meditation that they have had 29 lives together, and that's not all! They join Darkness Radio to tell us what exactly they learned through meditation, Past life regression, and reincarnation! 

Pick up any of the four books Dave and Carla have written about their experience:  https://thegiftofpastlives.com/

Today is your LAST day to get tickets for the UFO Disclosure Symposium!! You can stream the event from home this weekend!  Click here for more information: https://ufodisclosuresymposium.com/?ref=tim%40darknessradio.com
